section.title: some and any
section.sectiontitle: We use some with plural and uncountable nouns when we don't say exactly how many or how much.
section.text2a: There's some soup and bread for lunch.
section.sectiontitle2: In the negative, we use not any or no.

section.title: some and any
section.sectiontitle: In the question, we usually use any with plural and uncountable nouns.
section.text1a: Have you got any brothers? Yes, I have.
section.text2a: Is there any meat in this soup? No, there isn't.
section.sectiontitle2: We usually use some with Can I have some ...? We can also use some with Would you like some ...?
